lead_paragraph: The 25-year-old man, whom the police were seeking in connection with four assaults, was found in a building on the Upper East Side of Manhattan after apparently hanging himself, the police said.

headline.main: Man Sought in Connection With Attacks on Asian Women Is Found Dead

snippet: The 25-year-old man, whom the police were seeking in connection with four assaults, was found in a building on the Upper East Side of Manhattan after apparently hanging himself, the police said.
